thread.title: Has Khloe Kardashian put boyfriend James Harden on hold for Lamar Odom?
thread.title_full: Has Khloe Kardashian put boyfriend James Harden on hold for Lamar Odom?

title: Has Khloe Kardashian put boyfriend James Harden on hold for Lamar Odom?
text:
Has Khloe Kardashian put boyfriend James Harden on hold for Lamar Odom? By IANS | Posted 1 hour 
Keeping Up With the Kardashians star has reportedly taken a break from her relationship with NBA player James in the wake of her estranged husband Lamar Odom's medical condition 
Los Angles: Reality TV personality Khloe Kardashian has reportedly put a brake on her relationship with NBA player James Harden. Khloe Kardashian (Pic/Getty Images) and James Harden 
According to a source, the Keeping Up With the Kardashians star has put her relationship with James Harden on hold in the wake of her estranged husband Lamar Odom's medical crisis, reports tmz.com. 
Khloe will be by Odom's side during his rehabilitation who had collapsed at a brothel last week. 
The 31-year-old had filed for divorce from Odom last year in December after four years of marriage. Tags:
